ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of SHARI A. STEIN of Toronto, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years; and designation of SHARI A. STEIN to be Assistant Deputy Chairperson of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), effective April 17, 2008.
